message.body: if only smw had this many settings.
wasd movement means you will walk with wasd, you walk with arrows if disabled
yeah i think it disables arrow movements
i can tell you what any options mean if you don't understand
if you remap the "+num key" controlls, how does that work?
speed up i don't know but battle process goes automatically so battle process x2 x5 toggles it to be faster
The 2X and 5X is fast-forward and faster-forward I guess?
if you hold both, do you get 10X Kappa
i guess tab you should hold down? idk i just turned off battle scene in the beginning lol
Speed up is permanent once you tap it Kappa
you will understand everything when you start the game :)
Kruela Mario, but the puzzle is finding a set of settings that allow you to beat the level Kappa
im not going to tell you what bgs mean
just map all of them to spacebar.
if you quick save and quick load on the same button, in what order do they happen?
i feel the energy of smw players
The password game, settings menu edition.
"The atomic elements in your key binds need to have total weight 123."
i think you have z twice
i don't think you will be using auto min button much
that's why here remapping goes nuts
Maybe there's an item that increases FPS by 1.
are you playing a drinking game or what
drink whenever you press a key and nothing happens.
drink a shot every time they mention god
There's a secret in file 357. Kapp
yeah this effect is what screen break means
"keys can destroy crystals" sounds like asm nobody needs.
it's patterns on shields for example
I think this game needs more mechanics.
no red doors you will see in the future
can't wait for the End of Demo screen once you finish this dialog.
right, that should just be a softlock.
the number with them is the overall damage you get
i think it's better to just say that
i.e.. potions can't heal you covertly.
the button is your interact button
i never tried walking in the doors directly
oh they didn't actually tell you the key mechanic
when you stand on the tile adjacent to an item, you can press z to turn around to collect an item without stepping on the tile of this item
this is very useful later on
you can tap these enemies to watch their skills
10% joint, ah that's why he has to float, bad knees.
so for every enemy with this ability their hp is 10% more
there are 2 floaters on this map
it just tells you which enemies are on the map
would you really want to see 10 lines of blue slime hatchlings that you have to scroll past?
also the number near the monsters already includes their abilities
20% drain means every attack the slime will convert 20% of the damage into health (regenerates)
good we start playing after an hour
1 battle, that's enough for today, time to relax.
next week we can read the tutorial again.
if the soul is red you're in rage
and you will find the monster automatically
below = base state, big number = total, green = souls bonus.
you will need that a lot
he's still working out the optimal route through this room Kappa
why don't we fight the floater again, then we can try another route Kapp
also you can run by holding shift
red orbs allow you to grow more hair
clearly you just need a faster PC.
if only you knew what pc he has
he's a snes9x user, his PC can't be that fast.
his avoidances are very pc demanding
if the avoidance lags, you get more time to react.
just like yoshi, yoshi can eat keys too.
yoshi dies most of the time
why would doing it first matter?
2 potions + 1 key only have additive effects.
you get hp and a key
i think you also broke him
...amazing we're back in the first room.
i think you shouldn't have said that
we could have been in the second room
What were the controlls again Kapp
dw, we'll remind you to load frequently.
you can even choose the background by opening it in a different room.
cool now your settings are almost matching mine
you literally had the same in the first room
what's so special about the dark serpent?
biob it just takes the sprite of an enemy
it's the same sprite, just from the back
good at least we clarified this
what is surprising is that the crystals don't face a direction.
maybe we should read the tutorial again Kapp
did you think that bottles are...
dw at least you're getting at
maybe the green bottle poisons the NPC.
I don't know what red damage is, maybe <100?
you don't know how much this game recommendation from me was a trap
the real game is not losing your mind to chat.
it will be times three for you
let's give him some time to play the game
it's a shame we've run out of red things on screen.
there are a bunch of blue ones in the enemy stats.
i don't see stats too often
shorter red hair is you on the map.
oop we are back to the beginning of the second screen
blue HP on the stats screen is the amount of health points the enemy has
little blue number near the defense stat is your base stat
aaaaand we're back on the first screen
also, I just realized that you're wearing a red cape and red skirt.
so your hair isn't actually that long.
i think it's like a red cape rather
he doesn't have long hair because he doesn't collect red orbs
don't get too excited, maybe we'll rewind back to the start of the room.
_sad_, no bad ending where you become an evil soul.
i think biob will become an evil soul soon
What were the controlls again Kapp
no shortcuts until you understand the mechanics
luckily there are no hidden walls
wait, is the cape woven out of your hair? It has the same color after all.
oh no dacin has the hair lore coming
...taking this one step fruther, are the potions brewed from your hair. ew!
oh, is that howling a BGS?
I guess it copies your soul boost?
oh dacin is there a way to contact you like on discord
you can talk to me in twitch chat. Kappa
i mean, yes I have discord.
but is your probability of being in twitch chat is 100%
no, but neither is my probability of being on discord.
I suppose twitch chat is less reliable as twitch sometimes hates my e-mail address for no reason.
maybe you have cussing words in your email
ah, yes, the biggest cussing words, "dacin" and "dacin".
well you don't know all languages in the world
in the language of somebody whose pit hack I broke.
yeah i heard smw people break others' games often
slightly bigger red number is the damage you have just taken.
why do you think it's much worse... you take 3 less damage with three shields
oh every shield orb gives you 2 shield
I gtg, have a good night.
actually i have a paper that needs to be finished writing so i have to go as well
i hope we enhanced your mechanics understanding
